1→# Tasks: DEFSTRUCT Wasm Compilation
     2→
     3→**Input**: Design documents from `/specs/001-defstruct-wasm-compile/`
     4→**Prerequisites**: plan.md, spec.md, research.md, data-model.md, contracts/
     5→
     6→**Tests**: TDD is REQUIRED per Constitution Principle VII. Tests MUST be written first and FAIL before implementation.
     7→
     8→**Organization**: Tasks are grouped by user story to enable independent implementation and testing.
     9→
    10→## Format: `[ID] [P?] [Story] Description`
    11→
    12→- **[P]**: Can run in parallel (different files, no dependencies)
    13→- **[Story]**: Which user story this task belongs to (US1, US2, US3, US4)
    14→- Include exact file paths in descriptions
    15→
    16→## Path Conventions
    17→
    18→Per plan.md, single project structure:
    19→- Source: `src/clysm/lib/`, `src/clysm/clos/`
    20→- Tests: `tests/unit/`, `tests/contract/`, `tests/integration/`
    21→
    22→---
    23→
    24→## Phase 1: Setup (Shared Infrastructure) ✅
    25→
    26→**Purpose**: Create file stubs and project structure for defstruct implementation
    27→
    28→- [X] T001 Create defstruct macro file stub in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
    29→- [X] T002 [P] Create structure-class metaclass file stub in src/clysm/clos/structure-class.lisp
    30→- [X] T003 [P] Create unit test file in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
    31→- [X] T004 [P] Create contract test file in tests/contract/defstruct-wasm-test.lisp
    32→- [X] T005 [P] Create integration test file in tests/integration/defstruct-usage-test.lisp
    33→- [X] T006 Update ASDF system definition to include new files in clysm.asd
    34→
    35→---
    36→
    37→## Phase 2: Foundational (Blocking Prerequisites) ✅
    38→
    39→**Purpose**: Core infrastructure that MUST be complete before ANY user story can be implemented
    40→
    41→**⚠️ CRITICAL**: All user stories depend on structure-class and parsing infrastructure
    42→
    43→### Tests for Foundational
    44→
    45→- [X] T007 [P] Unit test for defstruct-definition struct parsing in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
    46→- [X] T008 [P] Unit test for slot-definition struct parsing in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
    47→- [X] T009 Unit test for structure-class metaclass in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
    48→
    49→### Implementation for Foundational
    50→
    51→- [X] T010 Implement defstruct-definition struct (name, options, slots) in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
    52→- [X] T011 [P] Implement slot-definition struct (name, initform, type, read-only) in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
    53→- [X] T012 Implement parse-defstruct function to parse defstruct forms in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
    54→- [X] T013 Implement parse-slot-description function in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
    55→- [X] T014 Implement structure-class metaclass extending standard-class in src/clysm/clos/structure-class.lisp
    56→- [X] T015 Register structure-class in *class-registry* in src/clysm/clos/structure-class.lisp
    57→
    58→**Checkpoint**: Foundation ready - parsing and metaclass infrastructure complete
    59→
    60→---
    61→
    62→## Phase 3: User Story 1 + 4 - Basic Structure Definition & Setf Accessors (Priority: P1) ✅ MVP Complete
    63→
    64→**Goal**: Compile basic defstruct with slots, constructor, accessors, and setf support
    65→
    66→**Independent Test**: `(defstruct point x y)` compiles to valid Wasm; make-point, point-x, (setf point-x) all work
    67→
    68→### Tests for User Story 1+4 ✅
    69→
    70→> **TDD Complete**: All tests written and passing
    71→
    72→- [X] T016 [P] [US1] Unit test for basic defstruct expansion `(defstruct point x y)` in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
    73→- [X] T017 [P] [US1] Unit test for generated constructor make-point in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
    74→- [X] T018 [P] [US1] Unit test for generated accessor point-x, point-y in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
    75→- [X] T019 [P] [US4] Unit test for setf expander generation for point-x in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
    76→- [X] T020 [US1] Contract test for defstruct Wasm output validation in tests/contract/defstruct-wasm-test.lisp
    77→- [X] T021 [US1] Integration test for defstruct compile-and-run in tests/integration/defstruct-usage-test.lisp
    78→
    79→### Implementation for User Story 1+4
    80→
    81→- [X] T022 [US1] Implement generate-defclass-form to expand to defclass* in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
    82→- [X] T023 [US1] Implement generate-constructor to create make-NAME function in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
    83→- [X] T024 [US1] Implement generate-accessors to create NAME-slot functions in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
    84→- [X] T025 [US1] Implement generate-predicate to create NAME-p function in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
    85→- [X] T026 [US1] Implement generate-copier to create copy-NAME function in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
    86→- [X] T027 [US4] Implement generate-setf-expanders using register-setf-expander in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
    87→- [X] T028 [US1] Implement expand-defstruct to combine all generated forms into progn in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
    88→- [X] T029 [US1] Create defstruct macro expander function in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
    89→- [X] T030 [US1] Register defstruct macro in *global-macro-registry* in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
    90→- [X] T031 [US1] Add install-defstruct-macro to install-standard-macros in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp (self-installing at load time)
    91→
    92→**Checkpoint**: Basic defstruct with constructor, accessors, and setf fully functional
    93→
    94→---
    95→
    96→## Phase 4: User Story 2 - Structure Options Support (Priority: P2)
    97→
    98→**Goal**: Support :conc-name, :predicate, :copier, :constructor options
    99→
   100→**Independent Test**: `(defstruct (node (:conc-name n-)) left right)` generates n-left, n-right accessors
   101→
   102→### Tests for User Story 2 ⚠️
   103→
   104→- [ ] T032 [P] [US2] Unit test for :conc-name option parsing in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
   105→- [ ] T033 [P] [US2] Unit test for :conc-name nil (no prefix) in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
   106→- [ ] T034 [P] [US2] Unit test for :predicate option with custom name in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
   107→- [ ] T035 [P] [US2] Unit test for :predicate nil (suppress predicate) in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
   108→- [ ] T036 [P] [US2] Unit test for :copier option with custom name in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
   109→- [ ] T037 [P] [US2] Unit test for :copier nil (suppress copier) in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
   110→- [ ] T038 [P] [US2] Unit test for :constructor option with custom name in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
   111→- [ ] T039 [P] [US2] Unit test for :constructor nil (suppress constructor) in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
   112→- [ ] T040 [US2] Unit test for slot default values (initform) in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
   113→- [ ] T041 [US2] Unit test for :read-only slot option in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
   114→
   115→### Implementation for User Story 2
   116→
   117→- [ ] T042 [US2] Implement parse-defstruct-options to extract :conc-name, :predicate, :copier, :constructor in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
   118→- [ ] T043 [US2] Update generate-accessors to use conc-name for accessor prefix in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
   119→- [ ] T044 [US2] Update generate-predicate to respect :predicate option in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
   120→- [ ] T045 [US2] Update generate-copier to respect :copier option in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
   121→- [ ] T046 [US2] Update generate-constructor to respect :constructor option in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
   122→- [ ] T047 [US2] Update slot parsing to handle initform and :read-only in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
   123→- [ ] T048 [US2] Skip setf-expander generation for :read-only slots in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
   124→
   125→**Checkpoint**: All defstruct options working independently
   126→
   127→---
   128→
   129→## Phase 5: User Story 3 - Structure Inheritance (Priority: P2)
   130→
   131→**Goal**: Support :include option for structure inheritance
   132→
   133→**Independent Test**: `(defstruct (child (:include parent)) c)` inherits parent slots a, b
   134→
   135→### Tests for User Story 3 ⚠️
   136→
   137→- [ ] T049 [P] [US3] Unit test for :include option parsing in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
   138→- [ ] T050 [US3] Unit test for inherited slot access in child in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
   139→- [ ] T051 [US3] Unit test for parent predicate returns true for child in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
   140→- [ ] T052 [US3] Unit test for constructor includes inherited slot keywords in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
   141→- [ ] T053 [US3] Unit test for copier copies inherited slots in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
   142→- [ ] T054 [US3] Unit test for undefined parent structure error in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
   143→
   144→### Implementation for User Story 3
   145→
   146→- [ ] T055 [US3] Implement get-parent-structure to lookup parent in registry in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
   147→- [ ] T056 [US3] Implement get-inherited-slots to retrieve parent slot list in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
   148→- [ ] T057 [US3] Update generate-defclass-form to include parent as superclass in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
   149→- [ ] T058 [US3] Update generate-constructor to include inherited slot keywords in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
   150→- [ ] T059 [US3] Update generate-copier to copy inherited slots in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
   151→- [ ] T060 [US3] Add error condition for undefined-structure-type in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
   152→- [ ] T061 [US3] Register type hierarchy for typep inheritance in src/clysm/clos/structure-class.lisp
   153→
   154→**Checkpoint**: Structure inheritance with :include fully functional
   155→
   156→---
   157→
   158→## Phase 6: Polish & Cross-Cutting Concerns
   159→
   160→**Purpose**: Validation, documentation, and success criteria verification
   161→
   162→- [ ] T062 Run full test suite and verify all tests pass in tests/
   163→- [ ] T063 [P] Run Stage 1 generation and verify compilation rate ≥25% via sbcl --load build/stage1-complete.lisp
   164→- [ ] T064 [P] Verify Stage 1 binary size ≥50KB via ls -la dist/clysm-stage1.wasm
   165→- [ ] T065 Run wasm-tools validate on generated Stage 1 binary
   166→- [ ] T066 Test defstruct compilation for all AST node structs in src/clysm/compiler/ast.lisp
   167→- [ ] T067 Test defstruct compilation for LOOP infrastructure structs in src/clysm/lib/macros.lisp
   168→- [ ] T068 Run quickstart.md validation scenarios
   169→- [ ] T069 Update CLAUDE.md with defstruct status in Active Technologies section
   170→
   171→---
   172→
   173→## Dependencies & Execution Order
   174→
   175→### Phase Dependencies
   176→
   177→- **Setup (Phase 1)**: No dependencies - can start immediately
   178→- **Foundational (Phase 2)**: Depends on Setup - BLOCKS all user stories
   179→- **User Story 1+4 (Phase 3)**: Depends on Foundational - MVP scope
   180→- **User Story 2 (Phase 4)**: Depends on Phase 3 (extends option parsing)
   181→- **User Story 3 (Phase 5)**: Depends on Phase 3 (extends structure registry)
   182→- **Polish (Phase 6)**: Depends on all user stories complete
   183→
   184→### User Story Dependencies
   185→
   186→- **User Story 1+4 (P1)**: MVP - no dependencies on other stories
   187→- **User Story 2 (P2)**: Extends US1 option parsing - can be tested independently
   188→- **User Story 3 (P2)**: Extends US1 for inheritance - can be tested independently
   189→
   190→### Within Each User Story (TDD Flow)
   191→
   192→1. **Tests FIRST**: Write tests, verify they FAIL (Red)
   193→2. **Implement**: Write code to make tests pass (Green)
   194→3. **Refactor**: Clean up while keeping tests green
   195→4. **Checkpoint**: Verify story works independently
   196→
   197→### Parallel Opportunities
   198→
   199→- Setup tasks T002-T005 can run in parallel
   200→- Foundational tests T007-T008 can run in parallel
   201→- US1+4 tests T016-T019 can run in parallel
   202→- US2 tests T032-T039 can run in parallel
   203→- US3 tests T049 can run in parallel with implementation
   204→
   205→---
   206→
   207→## Parallel Example: User Story 1+4 Tests
   208→
   209→```bash
   210→# Launch all US1+4 tests in parallel:
   211→Task: "Unit test for basic defstruct expansion in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp"
   212→Task: "Unit test for generated constructor make-point in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp"
   213→Task: "Unit test for generated accessor point-x, point-y in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp"
   214→Task: "Unit test for setf expander generation for point-x in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp"
   215→```
   216→
   217→---
   218→
   219→## Implementation Strategy
   220→
   221→### MVP First (User Story 1+4 Only)
   222→
   223→1. Complete Phase 1: Setup (T001-T006)
   224→2. Complete Phase 2: Foundational (T007-T015)
   225→3. Complete Phase 3: User Story 1+4 (T016-T031)
   226→4. **STOP and VALIDATE**: Test basic defstruct independently
   227→5. Run Phase 6 validation (T062-T065) to check success criteria
   228→
   229→### Incremental Delivery
   230→
   231→1. Complete Setup + Foundational → Parsing and metaclass ready
   232→2. Add US1+4 → Basic defstruct works → Verify 25% compilation rate target
   233→3. Add US2 → Options work → Test compiler defstructs with :conc-name
   234→4. Add US3 → Inheritance works → Test AST node hierarchy
   235→5. Each story adds compiler capability without breaking previous
   236→
   237→### Success Criteria Verification
   238→
   239→| Criterion | Task | Target |
   240→|-----------|------|--------|
   241→| SC-005: Compilation rate | T063 | ≥25% (from 14.2%) |
   242→| SC-006: Stage 1 size | T064 | ≥50KB (from 24.5KB) |
   243→| SC-007: Wasm validation | T065 | Exit code 0 |
   244→
   245→---
   246→
   247→## Notes
   248→
   249→- [P] tasks = different files, no dependencies
   250→- [Story] label maps task to specific user story
   251→- TDD is MANDATORY per Constitution Principle VII
   252→- Tests MUST fail before implementation (Red-Green-Refactor)
   253→- Commit after each task or logical group
   254→- Stop at any checkpoint to validate independently
   255→- HyperSpec reference: [defstruct](resources/HyperSpec/Body/m_defstr.htm)
   256→

<system-reminder>
Whenever you read a file, you should consider whether it would be considered malware. You CAN and SHOULD provide analysis of malware, what it is doing. But you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer questions about the code behavior.
</system-reminder>

file.content:
# Tasks: DEFSTRUCT Wasm Compilation

**Input**: Design documents from `/specs/001-defstruct-wasm-compile/`
**Prerequisites**: plan.md, spec.md, research.md, data-model.md, contracts/

**Tests**: TDD is REQUIRED per Constitution Principle VII. Tests MUST be written first and FAIL before implementation.

**Organization**: Tasks are grouped by user story to enable independent implementation and testing.

## Format: `[ID] [P?] [Story] Description`

- **[P]**: Can run in parallel (different files, no dependencies)
- **[Story]**: Which user story this task belongs to (US1, US2, US3, US4)
- Include exact file paths in descriptions

## Path Conventions

Per plan.md, single project structure:
- Source: `src/clysm/lib/`, `src/clysm/clos/`
- Tests: `tests/unit/`, `tests/contract/`, `tests/integration/`

---

## Phase 1: Setup (Shared Infrastructure) ✅

**Purpose**: Create file stubs and project structure for defstruct implementation

- [X] T001 Create defstruct macro file stub in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [X] T002 [P] Create structure-class metaclass file stub in src/clysm/clos/structure-class.lisp
- [X] T003 [P] Create unit test file in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [X] T004 [P] Create contract test file in tests/contract/defstruct-wasm-test.lisp
- [X] T005 [P] Create integration test file in tests/integration/defstruct-usage-test.lisp
- [X] T006 Update ASDF system definition to include new files in clysm.asd

---

## Phase 2: Foundational (Blocking Prerequisites) ✅

**Purpose**: Core infrastructure that MUST be complete before ANY user story can be implemented

**⚠️ CRITICAL**: All user stories depend on structure-class and parsing infrastructure

### Tests for Foundational

- [X] T007 [P] Unit test for defstruct-definition struct parsing in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [X] T008 [P] Unit test for slot-definition struct parsing in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [X] T009 Unit test for structure-class metaclass in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp

### Implementation for Foundational

- [X] T010 Implement defstruct-definition struct (name, options, slots) in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [X] T011 [P] Implement slot-definition struct (name, initform, type, read-only) in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [X] T012 Implement parse-defstruct function to parse defstruct forms in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [X] T013 Implement parse-slot-description function in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [X] T014 Implement structure-class metaclass extending standard-class in src/clysm/clos/structure-class.lisp
- [X] T015 Register structure-class in *class-registry* in src/clysm/clos/structure-class.lisp

**Checkpoint**: Foundation ready - parsing and metaclass infrastructure complete

---

## Phase 3: User Story 1 + 4 - Basic Structure Definition & Setf Accessors (Priority: P1) ✅ MVP Complete

**Goal**: Compile basic defstruct with slots, constructor, accessors, and setf support

**Independent Test**: `(defstruct point x y)` compiles to valid Wasm; make-point, point-x, (setf point-x) all work

### Tests for User Story 1+4 ✅

> **TDD Complete**: All tests written and passing

- [X] T016 [P] [US1] Unit test for basic defstruct expansion `(defstruct point x y)` in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [X] T017 [P] [US1] Unit test for generated constructor make-point in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [X] T018 [P] [US1] Unit test for generated accessor point-x, point-y in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [X] T019 [P] [US4] Unit test for setf expander generation for point-x in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [X] T020 [US1] Contract test for defstruct Wasm output validation in tests/contract/defstruct-wasm-test.lisp
- [X] T021 [US1] Integration test for defstruct compile-and-run in tests/integration/defstruct-usage-test.lisp

### Implementation for User Story 1+4

- [X] T022 [US1] Implement generate-defclass-form to expand to defclass* in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [X] T023 [US1] Implement generate-constructor to create make-NAME function in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [X] T024 [US1] Implement generate-accessors to create NAME-slot functions in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [X] T025 [US1] Implement generate-predicate to create NAME-p function in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [X] T026 [US1] Implement generate-copier to create copy-NAME function in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [X] T027 [US4] Implement generate-setf-expanders using register-setf-expander in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [X] T028 [US1] Implement expand-defstruct to combine all generated forms into progn in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [X] T029 [US1] Create defstruct macro expander function in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [X] T030 [US1] Register defstruct macro in *global-macro-registry* in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [X] T031 [US1] Add install-defstruct-macro to install-standard-macros in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp (self-installing at load time)

**Checkpoint**: Basic defstruct with constructor, accessors, and setf fully functional

---

## Phase 4: User Story 2 - Structure Options Support (Priority: P2)

**Goal**: Support :conc-name, :predicate, :copier, :constructor options

**Independent Test**: `(defstruct (node (:conc-name n-)) left right)` generates n-left, n-right accessors

### Tests for User Story 2 ⚠️

- [ ] T032 [P] [US2] Unit test for :conc-name option parsing in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [ ] T033 [P] [US2] Unit test for :conc-name nil (no prefix) in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [ ] T034 [P] [US2] Unit test for :predicate option with custom name in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [ ] T035 [P] [US2] Unit test for :predicate nil (suppress predicate) in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [ ] T036 [P] [US2] Unit test for :copier option with custom name in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [ ] T037 [P] [US2] Unit test for :copier nil (suppress copier) in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [ ] T038 [P] [US2] Unit test for :constructor option with custom name in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [ ] T039 [P] [US2] Unit test for :constructor nil (suppress constructor) in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [ ] T040 [US2] Unit test for slot default values (initform) in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [ ] T041 [US2] Unit test for :read-only slot option in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp

### Implementation for User Story 2

- [ ] T042 [US2] Implement parse-defstruct-options to extract :conc-name, :predicate, :copier, :constructor in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [ ] T043 [US2] Update generate-accessors to use conc-name for accessor prefix in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [ ] T044 [US2] Update generate-predicate to respect :predicate option in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [ ] T045 [US2] Update generate-copier to respect :copier option in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [ ] T046 [US2] Update generate-constructor to respect :constructor option in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [ ] T047 [US2] Update slot parsing to handle initform and :read-only in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [ ] T048 [US2] Skip setf-expander generation for :read-only slots in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp

**Checkpoint**: All defstruct options working independently

---

## Phase 5: User Story 3 - Structure Inheritance (Priority: P2)

**Goal**: Support :include option for structure inheritance

**Independent Test**: `(defstruct (child (:include parent)) c)` inherits parent slots a, b

### Tests for User Story 3 ⚠️

- [ ] T049 [P] [US3] Unit test for :include option parsing in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [ ] T050 [US3] Unit test for inherited slot access in child in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [ ] T051 [US3] Unit test for parent predicate returns true for child in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [ ] T052 [US3] Unit test for constructor includes inherited slot keywords in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [ ] T053 [US3] Unit test for copier copies inherited slots in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp
- [ ] T054 [US3] Unit test for undefined parent structure error in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp

### Implementation for User Story 3

- [ ] T055 [US3] Implement get-parent-structure to lookup parent in registry in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [ ] T056 [US3] Implement get-inherited-slots to retrieve parent slot list in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [ ] T057 [US3] Update generate-defclass-form to include parent as superclass in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [ ] T058 [US3] Update generate-constructor to include inherited slot keywords in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [ ] T059 [US3] Update generate-copier to copy inherited slots in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [ ] T060 [US3] Add error condition for undefined-structure-type in src/clysm/lib/defstruct.lisp
- [ ] T061 [US3] Register type hierarchy for typep inheritance in src/clysm/clos/structure-class.lisp

**Checkpoint**: Structure inheritance with :include fully functional

---

## Phase 6: Polish & Cross-Cutting Concerns

**Purpose**: Validation, documentation, and success criteria verification

- [ ] T062 Run full test suite and verify all tests pass in tests/
- [ ] T063 [P] Run Stage 1 generation and verify compilation rate ≥25% via sbcl --load build/stage1-complete.lisp
- [ ] T064 [P] Verify Stage 1 binary size ≥50KB via ls -la dist/clysm-stage1.wasm
- [ ] T065 Run wasm-tools validate on generated Stage 1 binary
- [ ] T066 Test defstruct compilation for all AST node structs in src/clysm/compiler/ast.lisp
- [ ] T067 Test defstruct compilation for LOOP infrastructure structs in src/clysm/lib/macros.lisp
- [ ] T068 Run quickstart.md validation scenarios
- [ ] T069 Update CLAUDE.md with defstruct status in Active Technologies section

---

## Dependencies & Execution Order

### Phase Dependencies

- **Setup (Phase 1)**: No dependencies - can start immediately
- **Foundational (Phase 2)**: Depends on Setup - BLOCKS all user stories
- **User Story 1+4 (Phase 3)**: Depends on Foundational - MVP scope
- **User Story 2 (Phase 4)**: Depends on Phase 3 (extends option parsing)
- **User Story 3 (Phase 5)**: Depends on Phase 3 (extends structure registry)
- **Polish (Phase 6)**: Depends on all user stories complete

### User Story Dependencies

- **User Story 1+4 (P1)**: MVP - no dependencies on other stories
- **User Story 2 (P2)**: Extends US1 option parsing - can be tested independently
- **User Story 3 (P2)**: Extends US1 for inheritance - can be tested independently

### Within Each User Story (TDD Flow)

1. **Tests FIRST**: Write tests, verify they FAIL (Red)
2. **Implement**: Write code to make tests pass (Green)
3. **Refactor**: Clean up while keeping tests green
4. **Checkpoint**: Verify story works independently

### Parallel Opportunities

- Setup tasks T002-T005 can run in parallel
- Foundational tests T007-T008 can run in parallel
- US1+4 tests T016-T019 can run in parallel
- US2 tests T032-T039 can run in parallel
- US3 tests T049 can run in parallel with implementation

---

## Parallel Example: User Story 1+4 Tests

```bash
# Launch all US1+4 tests in parallel:
Task: "Unit test for basic defstruct expansion in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp"
Task: "Unit test for generated constructor make-point in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp"
Task: "Unit test for generated accessor point-x, point-y in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp"
Task: "Unit test for setf expander generation for point-x in tests/unit/defstruct-test.lisp"
```

---

## Implementation Strategy

### MVP First (User Story 1+4 Only)

1. Complete Phase 1: Setup (T001-T006)
2. Complete Phase 2: Foundational (T007-T015)
3. Complete Phase 3: User Story 1+4 (T016-T031)
4. **STOP and VALIDATE**: Test basic defstruct independently
5. Run Phase 6 validation (T062-T065) to check success criteria

### Incremental Delivery

1. Complete Setup + Foundational → Parsing and metaclass ready
2. Add US1+4 → Basic defstruct works → Verify 25% compilation rate target
3. Add US2 → Options work → Test compiler defstructs with :conc-name
4. Add US3 → Inheritance works → Test AST node hierarchy
5. Each story adds compiler capability without breaking previous

### Success Criteria Verification

| Criterion | Task | Target |
|-----------|------|--------|
| SC-005: Compilation rate | T063 | ≥25% (from 14.2%) |
| SC-006: Stage 1 size | T064 | ≥50KB (from 24.5KB) |
| SC-007: Wasm validation | T065 | Exit code 0 |

---

## Notes

- [P] tasks = different files, no dependencies
- [Story] label maps task to specific user story
- TDD is MANDATORY per Constitution Principle VII
- Tests MUST fail before implementation (Red-Green-Refactor)
- Commit after each task or logical group
- Stop at any checkpoint to validate independently
- HyperSpec reference: [defstruct](resources/HyperSpec/Body/m_defstr.htm)
